name: It All Revolves Around You
description:
A giant black hole is hurtling towards Dust Town and you are the only thing in the entire universe that can save them! You'll have to grow from a speck of dust to an asteroid, a planet, a star, to something large enough to defeat the black hole.

Because in this game, like no other, It All Revolves Around You!

This is a simple game where you must absorb smaller objects in space to grow larger while avoiding the larger ones. The twist is that in this universe, in classic video game fashion, you are the centre of attention - and gravity.

"10/10 The best game I've ever made!" - UltimaN3rd"Ribbit!" - Froggie717"Wow xD I'm a little sad it's so short." - Daethcore_Seth2015-09-23 Update 1.0.1 - Made failure of a level less punishing
